title: This brand-new 512GB M2 Mac mini has never been cheaper
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for a new Mac with tons of speed without paying pro prices, the M2 Mac mini is a fantastic option. And today’s sale is the lowest we’ve ever seen: Amazon is selling the M2 Mac mini with 512GB of storage for $676 when you apply the coupon in the listing, a savings of $124.

The M2 Mac mini has the same classic design as its M1 predecessor but has a newer chip, HDMI 2 for powering an 8K display, Wi-Fi 6E for faster Internet speeds, and Bluetooth 5.3. Like before, you also get a pair of Thunderbolt 4 ports and USB-A ports, all packaged in a whisper-quiet case that won’t take up much space on your desk.

The Mac mini is already the cheapest Mac you can buy—especially if you have an old monitor lying around—and this deal makes it a downright bargain.
